pages.text: $(li)Pirates can be found conquering the seas and robbing $(l:patchouli:structures/fishing_ship)Fishing Ships$(/l) in their ships in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They have a lot of treasures in their ships, but they won't give them to you easily.
